snippet: The Hershey Co. has sued a Colorado marijuana edibles maker, claiming it makes four pot-infused candies that too closely resemble iconic products of the chocolate maker....

headline.print_headline: Hershey Sues Colorado Edible Pot Company
headline.main: Hershey Sues Colorado Edible Pot Company

lead_paragraph: The Hershey Co. has sued a Colorado marijuana edibles maker, claiming it makes four pot-infused candies that too closely resemble iconic products of the chocolate maker.
